title: I couldn't see my champs in ranked champ select or ban them, so i dodged against my will
body:
https://i.imgur.com/VEzJya2.png

Holy shit riot, i know all about your matchmaking manipulation, the fact that you want people to win or lose according to how you RNG the trolls in champ select, elo hell and so on, but coming down to this...

I MEAN, CMOOOON

-edit-

https://i.imgur.com/OUdhavR.png

I guess i'll try to turn it off and back on uh.

-edit-
https://i.imgur.com/jwg17hR.jpg

Whatever i'm going to sleep.

replies.body: I had the exact same problem as you, so bullshit imo.
